.. _general_examples:

Examples
========

This page contains some plotting guides for using watex. It is broken up into base, methods, view, and plot utility sections. For 
more in-depth guide, visit the :ref:`full user guide <user_guide>`.

Most of the data used for the plot examples are real-world geosciences engineering data. However, the scripts 
implemented for the visualization work with any kind of dataset.
